letter.letter_content:
You've been with us through so many unforgettable moments — college days, camping trips, and celebrating life together.
Please join us for one of the biggest milestones yet! We'd be overjoyed to have you witness and celebrate our wedding as we embark on this new chapter together.

rsvp.title: RSVP
rsvp.email_error: Something went wrong. Please try again.

accordion.vegetarian: We’re also offering a vegetarian option—just let us know in advance if that’s your preference!
